doctor.name: Dr. Md. Makhsudul Alam
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Makhsudul Alam is a Gastroenterologist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Gastroenterology), Fellow Liver Diseases (UK). He is a Associate Professor, Gastroenterology at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Makhsudul Alam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 2.30pm to 9pm (Sun, Mon & Thu) & 11am to 9pm (Wed & Friday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Naymul Hasan
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Naymul Hasan is a Gastroenterologist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Gastroenterology), CCD (BIRDEM), MACG (USA), Training (Endoscopy). He is a Assistant Professor, Gastroenterology at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Naymul Hasan at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 3pm to 10pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura
